dict.acceptation: 练习；运动，训练；运用；典礼；
锻炼（身体某部位）；使焦虑，使忧虑；实行，发挥（作用）；运用；

sent.orig: Exercise-induced bronchoconstriction (EIB) describes airway narrowing association with exercise.
sent.trans: 运动诱发性支气管痉挛(exercise-induced bronchoconstriction,EIB)是由运动诱发的急性短暂的气道缩窄。

sent.orig: Congress shall make no law establishment of religion, or prohibiting the free exercise exercise thereof.
sent.trans: 国会既不能在法律上给宗教地位，也不能禁止有关宗教的自由活动。

sent.orig: Exercise, especially aerobic exercise, generally makes it easier to fall asleep and sleep more soundly.
sent.trans: 运动，特别是有氧运动通常会使入睡更容易并且让你睡得更香。

sent.orig: Exercise duration per session was the most important element of an exercise prescription.
sent.trans: 在每次训练期间的练习是最重要的训练处方组成。

sent.orig: Each set will contain one empirical exercise and one exercise.
sent.trans: 每个习题集将包括一个实证练习和一个练习题。
